FuncDef: This command specifies the amount of time that the ingress node holds before programming its data plane and declaring a GMPLS LSP up. This occurs anytime the ingress UNI-C node brings up a GMPLS LSP path or reroutes a GMPLS LSP. Thehold-timevalue should be configured to reflect the data path programming time for the optical technology used between the ingress and egress UNI-N nodes.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ingress node hold time, in seconds. Values-5 to 300.
